column1: * Túrin arrives in Doriath and is welcomed by Thingol as a foster-son.
* Morgoth sends a force to Brithombar and Eglarest which are subsequently destroyed
column2: and Barad Nimras is cast down.
Gil-galad and other survivors retreat to the Isle of Balar but keep a base at the Mouths of Sirion.

column1: * Círdan builds seven ships and Turgon sends them Valinor to ask for help. All are lost save Voronwë
column2: who is washed ashore in Nevrast.
